idea: Ktizo Productions is based in mumbai. One stop for all your media & creative requirements .
name: Ktizo Productions

idea:
The Indian Retail Loan Landscape has seen Several Changes over past

Decade. From shift to digital ways of accepting, processing and

disbursing the Applications, to Preference for small ticket

Unsecured/Secured lending, to usage of Credit risk Models in

Underwriting Assessment becoming the new Normal. With Such

Nuanced disaggregation, Machine Learning and Smart Automation-

led Enablers are now a necessity for players to tap/Sustain into these

Opportunities at Scale.

Rapidly growing Consumer Credit Market and Confluence of mega

events (Demonetization, GST & Pandemic) have accelerated shift to

digital Medium, which has forced Banks/NBFCs and Fintechs to start

looking for solutions which can keep up with this change. Larger

Organizations are able to go pass this change with huge infusion of

CAPEX on digital Journeys in their Product cycle. Major Challenge

being faced by Medium & Small Organization because of optimum

resource (Both Manpower & Equity) allocation in the Business. Which

has led to the Idea of “First Rate” App as SAAS. “First Rate” is a Scoring

Model used for Gating of the Loan Applications with Minimum data

Points using AI, Machine Learning and APIs.

We at Protocol Credit are in process of developing “First Rate” app

(Android & IOS) which can be used by multiple banks/NBFCS/Fintech

which will led to Distribution of Research, Development and

Maintenance Cost of the application. Using the Common application

will only mean uniformity in technology, as Scoring Logic Native to the

Organization will Led to final Outcome of the Application.
name: First rate credit

idea:
Humm is an Omni channel Hyperlocal Discovery and Delivery Marketplace for anything local. The App allows users to order food from restaurants, groceries from local supermarkets and other products/utility items from neighborhood stores.

We have created a marketplace that allows consumers to directly place their orders through a single platform and have them fulfilled by local retail vendors in their vicinity. Additionally, the entire platform is powered by next generation payment systems which uses biometrics to enable payments.

Humm also owns its own fleet of Electric Vehicles and riders to service hyperlocal deliveries. The company’s vision is to be the world’s largest hyperlocal marketplace platform serviced by EV’s by 2025.
name: MAINS HUMM TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We started in 2020 August. A brand for bringing local, homegrown, fresh produce from farms to the city and building awareness on rural foods and their importance.
name: Tillage

idea: Druma Technologies Pvt Ltd is an AI company focusing on service and research. We provide software development services for clients throughout the globe which include data warehousing, analytics solutions, and cloud solution architecture. name: DRUMA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Eurotec Engineering Solutions is a startup aimed at manufacturing machinery for natural gas, biogas and hydrogen sectors


Initial idea is to offer CNG (Compressed Natural Gas) and Bio CNG compressors and fuel dispensers for retail fuel stations 


Next step would be to offer innovative, custom solutions for gas applications such as gas metering,, LNG (Liquified Natural Gas) Stations, Hydrogen compression , storage, transportation
name: EUROTEC ENGINEERING SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Unwired Connect (UWC) is an integrated cutting-edge R&D focussed technology company leveraging on IoT to drive the next level of digital transformation across varied domains. We Design, Develop and Deliver world class smart devices in Lighting, Switches, Sensors using Advanced technologies like WiFi, ZigBee, Bluetooth, Bluetooth Sigmesh for both Residential and Commercial Spaces. It is a combination of innovative products and improvement of existing similar products. Each product is designed and developed from scratch…including designing, prototyping and then commercially producing the same.
name: UNWIRED CONNECT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: EnviroAura Sustainable Solutions LLP.” is established by a group of IITian with a great motivation towards providing services in the environmental and sustainable development with the effort to balance clients needs and appropriate care of environment. We are committed to provide comprehensive and smart services in solid waste, air quality, energy, resource, climate, water and wastewater management. We are continuously progressing company with a keen focus on timely delivery. As part of our strategy, our company is committed to develop affordable, feasible and hassle free solutions for energy and environmental management that can help organizations and communities to achieve Eco-green goals, including zero waste. We believe in maintaining high standard by providing a reliable consultancy, and technical inclusion in environment sector.
name: ENVIROAURA SUSTAINABLE SOLUTIONS LLP
